question: Which one of the following civilizations has a direct connection with the Kingdom of Bahrain?
explanation: In the Bronze Age, Bahrain was inhabited by the Dilmun Civilization. Bahrain was an important trade centre linking Mesopotamia and Indus Valley. Dilmun was Semitic speaking polity in Arabia. Dilmun consists of Bahrain, Kuwait, Qatar and eastern parts of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
